item.title: President Trump’s War on ‘Information Silos’ Is Bad News for Your Personal Data
item.description: Donald Trump’s March 20 executive order aims to eliminate data silos. It could undermine privacy in the process.

item.title: HMD OffGrid Satellite Communicator Review: Fits in Your Pocket
item.description: If you love the backcountry, this tiny, tough, and relatively affordable satellite communicator can give you peace of mind.

item.title: 9 Best Protein Powders of 2025, Tested & Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: We found the best protein powders that won't make your shake taste like drywall.

item.title: Opera’s Air Browser Is Here to Make Your Internet Experience Less Stressful
item.description: Stay well on the web with Opera Air, a browser that plays soothing ambient music and encourages you to take breaks.

item.title: What Is the Meta AI Button in WhatsApp, and How Do I Remove It?
item.description: Meta’s in-app chatbot add-on is rolling out in more countries. Here’s what you need to know, including how to get rid of it.
